The Trellis is a block used to grow vines.
The following items when right clicked will grow different kinds of vines
$(li) Vine $(li2) Trellis with vine $(li) Moss Block or Moss Carpet$(li2) Trellis covered in moss $(li) Weeping Vines $(li2) Crimson Trellis $(li) Twisting Vines $(li2) Warped Trellis
$(li) Glow Berries $(li2) Trellis with Cave Vines $(li) Chorus Fruit $(li2) Trellis with Chorus Vine $(li) Glow Lichen $(li2) Trellis with Glow Lichen
